pr_title: Use reflection to get reduceOrder, termBytes and format due to java.lang.IllegalAccessError

timeline.message: Use reflection to get reduceOrder, termBytes and format due to java.lang.IllegalAccessError

timeline.author: palashhedau

replies.bodyText: I don't think it is a common style to have single line {}.
replies.author: vrozov

timeline.bodyText: Cant it be handled the same way as "throw new RuntimeException(e)" ?
timeline.author: palashhedau

replies.bodyText: There is no need to wrap RuntimeException in another RuntimeException
replies.author: vrozov

timeline.bodyText: Curious why we are using the InternalTerms.class instead of the previous StringTerms.class
timeline.author: debjanibnrj

replies.bodyText: Nvm, I see that StringTerms is a child class of InternalTerms.
replies.author: debjanibnrj

replies.bodyText: For getDeclaredField() to find the field it needs to be called for the class where the field is declared. In case of reduceOrder it is declared in InternalTerms.class and is accessible from subclasses (StringTerms.class)
replies.author: vrozov
